name: Photon Juggler
description:
A Breakout clone made as a part of gamedev.tv's Unity C# course in October 2019.

I still enjoy the mayhem of it so I'm sharing it from my archive!

All assets by me. Font is Awesome by Eeve Somepx at patreon.com/somepx

If you have issues with mouse stopping tracking the paddle, try playing in full screen.

Secret: There are hidden level skip buttons in the very top left and right corners of the screen.
